actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Indian and Insular Affairs

official_title: To take certain land located in San Diego County, California, into trust for the benefit of the Pala Band of Mission Indians, and for other purposes.
short_title: Pala Band of Mission Indians Land Transfer Act of 2017

summary.text:
Pala Band of Mission Indians Land Transfer Act of 2017

This bill directs the Department of the Interior to take land in San Diego County, California, into trust for the benefit of the Pala Band of Mission Indians, if the tribe transfers title to that land to the United States. The land is made part of the Pala Indian Reservation.

 No gaming may be conducted on the land.
